title: [LF G5+ for Permanent Spot in SRE, Top & JG]
body:
Hey all,
Storm Raisers Esports is recruiting again. We're looking for a Gold 5+ Top Laner and Jungler for our main team. Also we're thinking about making an Academy team again soon so do get in touch for that.
Thanks all,
_**~ Mr Zeroxs, Manager of Storm Raisers Esports.**_

**CONTACT ME HERE:**
**Discord** - SRA Kekzii#1194
**Phone Discord** - EatThatPussy445#5417
